Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Do I need a reservation for rental karts?
A: You do not need a reservation to run our rental karts. Just show up anytime rentals are racing!
Q: How old do you need to be to run the rental karts? Is there a height requirement?
A: You need to be 16+ with a drivers license to do the adult rental karts and 10+ to do our Jr karts. 16 and 17 year olds need to bring their license with them to the track. There is no height requirement. It is all based off of age.
Q: Is there a maximum weight restriction?
A: No. Everyone is built different. We always recommend that you sit in one of our karts before buying any races to see if you will be comfortable for 10 minutes at a time. You must be able to fully buckle the seatbelt.
Q: Does a permit count as a drivers license?
A: The State of Florida requires all racers of the adult karts to be 16+ with a drivers license. Permits
do not
count. If you are 16 and 17 years of age, you need to bring your license with you to the track.
Q: Can adults do the Jr karts with the kids?
A: Yes you can! The karts are a little smaller than the adult ones but adults can fit!
Q: Can I sign the waiver for a minor who is not my own?
A: No. The legal parent or guardian must sign for the minor. You can download the waiver and have it signed by the legal parent or guardian and notarized before coming to the track.
Q: How long is each race?
A: Adult kart races are 10 minutes long (~5-7 Laps). Jr kart races are 8 minutes long (~8-12 Laps)
Q: How fast do the karts go?
A: The adult karts go ~40-45mph and the Jr karts go ~30mph
Q: Can I share a 3 or 5 pack of races with other people?
A: No. They are for individual use.
Q: What happens when it rains?
A: We do not run rental karts while it is raining. We wait for the rain to stop, and then blow the puddles off the track. Once the track is deemed safe, we get back to racing.
Q: Is there food on site?
A: We have basic snacks and drinks for sale.
Q: Do you guys run Spyder MX?
A: No, we do not. All questions for Spyder can be answered on their website! Click the link!
https://spyder-mx.myshopify.com/
Contact Bushnell Motorsports Park

Group Events / Corporate Events
at Bushnell Motorsports Park
Only 45 minutes from Orlando, Ocala, Tampa, and Gainesville, you can make your Corporate Event, Bachelor Party, Car Club Event…etc a WIN this year by having a private event at Bushnell Motorsports Park. Say no to the same old company picnics and awkward and stiff gatherings. Make this event something that everyone remembers. Bushnell Motorsports Park can help you create an exciting, high-thrill private event, the perfect way to encourage team-building, boost morale and show appreciation.
Private Event / Track Rental Questionnaire

Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form.

My event does not use the rental karts
Groups under 10 please refer to our normal operating hours and pricing. Groups under 10 will be kept in the same races, but the track is shared with other rental customers.
Tell us more about your event
.wpforms-field-container

.wpforms-container
Group Event Packages:
Below you will find 3 different packages for a private event at BMP. Each event will allow you plenty of track time on our high-speed go karts as well as access to our meeting room, which can be used for a team meeting, catering and more.
Sprint Qualifying Race
Recommended for groups of 10-40 people
Our Sprint Qualifying Race gives groups a competitive and fun racing event that is a structured 3 or 4 race event. Minimum of 10-racers.
$100 per person.
Exclusive use of the track
Use of the meeting room for team meetings, catering and more.
Safety and competition briefing
Group coach to coach racers as the sessions progress.
Lap times will be tracked for each racer for each round
10-minute practice round for each racer.
10-minute qualifying round for each racer to set the grid for the Feature Race.
8-Lap Standing Start Feature Race
Awards Ceremony with small trophy and Event Winner T-Shirt for 1st place, a medal for 2nd place and a medal for 3rd place.
Water and snacks provided.
Additional 10-minute races can be added for  $25 per racer.
Catering available upon request.
Corporate Happy Hour
Recommended for groups of 40+ people
1 hour of unlimited, unstructured karting sessions (approx. 80-100 rides during the hour)
$2400
Private Track Time
Safety and Competition Briefing
8-minute racing heats (Racers can race as much or as little as they wish during the allotted time).
Lap times tracked for each person in each heat.
Use of the meeting room for team meeting, catering, and more.
Additional hours available for $1800 per hour. Each hour adds approx. 80-100 rides to your event.
Catering available upon request
Endurance Racing
For groups of 12+, the Endurance Race splits your group into teams of 2-6 drivers (depending on the length of your endurance race and the amount of racers total) and works in relay-style teamed format. Driver changes and pit stops all play into the strategy of these action-packed events. Whichever team completes the most laps in the given period of time wins. You get a safety and competition briefing, as well as coaching along the way to tweak your driving skills.
A 20-minute practice session is included prior to the Endurance Race.
40-minute endurance race – $175 per team (minimum of 5 teams required).
60-minute Endurance Race – $225 per team (minimum of 5 teams required).
Birthday Parties
Trying to plan a birthday party? We have a room just for you. Our party room will hold up to 50-60 people and it comes with 10 races that you can split between any members of your party. This $400 package can be used with our adult karts (16+ with a DL) or our jr karts (10+). If you need more races than 10, each additional race will be $22.
Name Your Price / Create Your Own
Not sure what you want? We can help! Tell us your budget and how many people you want and we can create the perfect private event for you.
Book Your Event Now!
To plan your event, fill out the form at the top of this page, email us, or call us at
(352) 568-0778
!
